name: The Forgotten Forest
description: The Forgotten Forest is about a young girl who is lost in a cursed forest. Discover the hidden secrets behind this mysterious forest, and find a way to escape. But most of all, don't forget The Forgotten Forest.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, or 7 (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: Intel速 Pentium速 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Intel速 Pentium速 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM

reviews.review_text: I like it. There are some parts of the game that was hard to figure it out. And the endings are well hidden. Nice rpg story. :)
